Hart | Scala Engineer | Anaheim, CA | ONSITE

You will be working with Scala and building out our ETL Systems for use with all our applications that support the Hart ecosystem of applications and connected user devices.

You’ll work with the team to build products on the cutting edge of usability, interaction, and design. Our ideal candidate is someone who’s comfortable taking ownership of their work and effectively searching for creative solutions to the complex problems we encounter.

You’ll work in a high-communication environment where collaboration with the Design, Data Science, and Backend Engineering teams is key to your day-to-day success.
